滾.definition: to boil; to roll; to take a hike; Get lost!

滾刀.definition: (engineering) gear hob (cutting tool used in manufacturing gears)

滾刀塊.definition: chunks obtained by repeatedly cutting a vegetable diagonally and rotating the vegetable after each cut

滾刀肉.definition: annoying person; troublemaker; pain in the neck

滾動.definition: to roll; (to do sth) in a loop; to scroll (computing); to progressively expand (economics); to rumble (of thunder)

滾彩蛋.definition: egg rolling (rolling of decorated, hard-boiled eggs down hillsides by children at Easter)

滾滾.definition: to surge on; to roll on

滾球.definition: lawn bowls; bocce; pétanque; bowling ball

滾瓜爛熟.definition: lit. ripe as a melon that rolls from its vine (idiom); fig. to know fluently; to know sth inside out; to know sth by heart

滾石.definition: Rock Records, Taiwanese record label; the Rolling Stones, British rock band; Rolling Stone (magazine)

滾石上山.definition: lit. to roll a boulder up a hill (like Sisyphus) (idiom); fig. to engage in a highly challenging task with perseverance and determination

滾蛋.definition: get out of here!; beat it!

滾輪.definition: roller; rotating dial; (computer mouse) scroll wheel; (road roller) drum

滾開.definition: (of a liquid) to boil; boiling hot; (rude) get out!; go away!; fuck off!
